SDV Enhanced - WizardTower Patch for West Forest

Entries.romanceLunna_Yes: Oh! That's nice to hear. You better take care of her okay?$h

Entries.75160006/e 75160005/D Lunna/d Fri: none/69 8/farmer 69 2 2 Wizard 41 10 1/skippable/move farmer 0 5 2/speak Wizard "Hello there my dear @!$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Wizard 69 5/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Hmmmmmm...."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Wizard "I'm sorry for suddenly appearing out of no where @.#$b#But is it true that you and Lunna are now a couple?$h."/pause 500/question null "You and Lunna are in romantic terms are you not?#Yes we are#Maybe? What is it to you?#Among other people"/emote Wizard 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "Ohhh...#$b#But I should ask you. Has she said anything not normal?#$b#Anything about herself or another land?"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "A bit peculiar I may say...#$b#She is one who normally gives in to her emotions and blabs about things that should be kept secret."/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "She may have grown up in a mental and emotional sense I believe.. May it be influence from spending time here or from @..."/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "Pardon me for being at lost from my own thoughts..#$b#But I have a favor to ask of you."/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Wizard "It is a simple task.#$b#Simply keep an eye of her, If there is any event that you would perceive strange in a sense..#$b#You should seek for my presence."/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "That is all. Carry on with your day. Bye @!$h"/showFrame Wizard 16/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Wizard 41 10/emote farmer 16/pause 800/fade/message "I wonder what was that all about?"/end
Entries.75160010/e 75160009: sweet/13 29/farmer 5 27 2 Lunna 5 32 0 Dianna -1000 -1000 0/skippable/pause 500/emote Lunna 16/pause 800/speak Lunna "@!?$6"/emote farmer 16/pause 800/move Lunna 0 -4 0/pause 800/speak Lunna "I am sorry I was just shocked to see you this early at the Goddess's place.$u#$b#I was on my way here to ask the Goddess for some funds for the errands she has me doing.$0"/pause 500/emote Lunna 32/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Lunna "So? What were you doing here @?..$l"/emote farmer 16/pause 800/jump Lunna/speak Lunna "WHAT?!$6#$b#Really @?!$u"/jump farmer/pause 800/emote Lunna 28/pause 800/speak Lunna "I..... I....$11#$b#I am so happy @!$10"/emote farmer 20/emote Lunna 20/pause 1000/speak Lunna "Well? What are waiting for! Lead me to the pond @!$10"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeToTemporaryMap LunnaLake false/warp farmer 15 19/warp Lunna 14 19/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Lunna 0/viewport 14 12/pause 500/move Lunna 0 -3 0/pause 500/emote Lunna 16/pause 2000/faceDirection Lunna 2/speak Lunna "@! I cannot wait to jump in the pond!$h#$b#I am really excited to see Umuwi and my little sister again!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 800/message "Shall we? Lunna?"/pause 500/speak Lunna "Yes! Let's go @...$8"/faceDirection Lunna 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/warp farmer -999 -999/warp Lunna -998 -998/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeToTemporaryMap Umuwi false/warp farmer 92 29/warp Lunna 93 29/warp Dianna 78 31/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Lunna 2/viewport 94 30/pause 1000/move Lunna 0 2 2/pause 1000/emote Lunna 20/pause 800/faceDirection Lunna 0/pause 1000/speak Lunna "@...Thank you so much! To you and the Goddess!$10"/move farmer 0 2 1/faceDirection Lunna 3/emote farmer 32/emote Lunna 60/pause 800/speak Lunna "I owe you a lot @...$10#$b#I love you so much..$l"/showFrame Lunna 25/positionOffset Lunna -10 0/positionOffset farmer 10 0/animate farmer false true 100 101/emote Lunna 20/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/warp Lunna 93 31/warp farmer 92 31/faceDirection Lunna 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Lunna "Well I...$l"/message "???: Who?? Who are you??"/emote farmer 16/emote Lunna 16/faceDirection farmer 3/move Dianna 6 0 1/textAboveHead Dianna "Uhhmm.. Hello there!"/move farmer 0 1 3/move Lunna -1 0 3/speak Dianna "Uhhhmmmm...$0#$b#Whatcha doin here humans?$0#$b#I mean! How did you get here? You came out of nowhere!$h#$b#Dun worry! I am friendly!$u#$b#Unless you are not!$a"/pause 1000/move Lunna -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Lunna "Dianna?...$11#$b#Dianna it's me.. Do you not recognize me?$10"/pause 500/emote Dianna 8/pause 800/speak Dianna "Uhhhhhhhh$0#$b#Who are you lady human?$h"/pause 200/speak Dianna "I mean! I dun know any humans besides M. Raphael and Bianka.#h#$b#I'm so sorry If I dun know you lady!$0"/pause 1000/move Lunna -4 0 3/showFrame Lunna 35/emote Dianna 8/pause 800/move Dianna 2 0 1/speak Dianna "There there lady human.#$b#Dun cry too much now would ya!$h#$b#What's the problem???$h"/emote Lunna 28/pause 800/speak Lunna "Dianna... It is me.. Lunna! Your sister!$10"/pause 800/emote Dianna 16/stopMusic/speak Dianna "How do you know that name human!$a#$b#Don't you dare make fun of my lost sister!$a#$b#She isn't a human like you guys are!$a"/pause 200/shake Lunna 1000/showFrame Lunna 51/speak Lunna "But Dianna! It is me! I turned into a human upon jumping into the lake after having the monsters chase me away from you!$11#$b#I am not lying to you Dianna!$11"/emote Dianna 12/emote Lunna 28/pause 800/speak Lunna "DIANNA LISTEN TO ME!$11#$b#Uhhhhhhhhhgg...$12"/showFrame Lunna 34/glow 255 255 255/pause 1000/emote Dianna 16/emote farmer 16/message "Lunna seems to be radiating some kind of magic"/glow 255 255 255/pause 1000/speak Dianna "Uhhhh!? Lady?! Are you okay?$0"/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -4 0 3/message "Lunna! Are you okay?!"/speak Lunna "@.... I got carried away by my emotions...$12#$b#The magic is going wild... I do not know what to do!$13"/pause 200/message "You remember the wizard mentioning something about this.."/message "..about how Lunna's magic reacts calmer with you around.."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/message "You hold on to Lunna tightly"/playMusic desolate/positionOffset farmer -10 0/animate farmer true true 100 101/glow 255 255 255/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 216 8 178/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 216 8 178/pause 1000/showFrame Lunna 29/stopAnimation farmer/warp farmer 88 31/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Dianna 16/pause 800/speak Dianna "Lady! Your face! You..$4"/glow 216 8 178/pause 1000/faceDirection Lunna 3/showFrame Lunna 31/pause 1000/speak Dianna "You look like big sis Lunna...$0"/pause 500/speak Lunna "It is me my little Dianna! I am home!$14#$b#I tried to tell you!$14"/pause 200/emote Dianna 40/pause 800/speak Dianna "Lunna?..$0"/emote Dianna 16/pause 800/speak Dianna "LUNNA! IT IS YOU!$s"/glow 194 255 4/pause 1000/faceDirection Lunna 0/faceDirection Lunna 3/emote Dianna 16/pause 800/speak Dianna "Huh!? Where did your face go Lunna!$a"/emote Lunna 8/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh?$0#$b#It seems the magic has calmed down entirely$u"/pause 1000/emote Dianna 40/pause 800/speak Dianna "But is that really you big sis Lunna?$s"/pause 500/showFrame Lunna 35/pause 1000/emote Dianna 28/pause 800/speak Lunna "Yes.. It is really me Dianna..$11#$b#Come give your big sis a hug$10"/speak Dianna "BIG SIS LUNNA!$s"/warp Dianna -1000 -1000/showFrame Lunna 39/pause 2000/speak Dianna "LUNNA!! I MISSED YOU SO MUCH!! WHERE DID YOU GO!$s"/speak Lunna "I shall tell you later Dianna... I am just glad I could see you again..$10"/speak Dianna "I missed you!$s#$b#I was so lonely Lunna!$s#$b#WAHHHHHHHHHH$s"/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/warp Lunna 85 19/warp Dianna 84 19/warp farmer 87 19/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Lunna 3/faceDirection Dianna 1/stopMusic/pause 2000/message "..A little while later"/viewport 88 18/playMusic sweet/pause 1000/speak Dianna "Ohhh so that's why you were lost! You were in a whole other place!"/pause 500/speak Lunna "Yes well I do not even know how and why I turned into a human.#$b#The last thing I remember before that was falling into this lake here.$u#$b#After that I ended up in staying in Pelican Town for a while#$b#and learned a lot of stuff, met new humans, and even more!$h"/pause 500/emote Dianna 16/pause 800/speak Dianna "Even more humans! WOAH!$4"/jump Dianna/emote Lunna 20/pause 1000/speak Dianna "Uhm.#$b#Who's that with you big sis?"/faceDirection Lunna 1/textAboveHead Lunna "Oh!!"/pause 800/speak Dianna "I saw you two together hugging so close.#$b#It was SOOOO close that it looked like your faces were mixed with each other.$u"/emote Lunna 60/emote farmer 60/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh!$l#$b#Meet @ Dianna..$l#$b#He is my boyfriend...$l^She is my girlfriend...$l"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Dianna "Oh! Really!?$4"/move Dianna 0 1 1/move Dianna 3 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Dianna 40/pause 800/speak Dianna "I like you! You make big sis happy!#$b#My name is Dianna! Nice to meet you big boi!$h^My name is Dianna! Nice to meet you tall gerl!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/faceDirection Dianna 3/speak Dianna "Big sis? Are you going to come home again?"/pause 800/emote Lunna 16/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh! Uhmmm...$12"/emote Dianna 8/emote farmer 8/pause 2000/showFrame Lunna 23/speak Lunna "I have thought about it while we were on the way here...$12#$b#And uhmm$12"/pause 2000/speak Lunna "I wish to stay with @...$12#$b#I do really miss you and this place Dianna but..$12"/pause 500/move Dianna -2 0 0/pause 1000/emote Lunna 28/pause 1000/emote Dianna 32/pause 800/speak Dianna "Lunna! Hey!$0#$b#It's okay!$h#$b#Whenever I started missing you so much, I just thought about some of our talks.$u#$b#And on those talks, You always mention about exploring the world!$0#$b#And you can't do that here when you're stuck in Umuwi$u"/faceDirection Lunna 2/emote Lunna 16/pause 800/speak Dianna "You belong where you are happy big sissy!$h#$b#And besides..."/faceDirection Dianna 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Dianna 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Dianna 0/speak Dianna "Now that there is a portal, You and @ can always come and visit Umuwi!$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Lunna 20/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh Dianna!$11#$b#When have you become more mature than me?$10"/pause 800/speak Dianna "I have always been more mature than you big sis! You big baby!$h"/emote Dianna 20/pause 800/speak Lunna "Thank you Dianna! I promise I shall visit often!"/pause 500/speak Dianna "Yes please!#$b#You and @ better bring lots of food and stuff for me okay!?$u"/emote farmer 32/emote Lunna 32/pause 200/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 1000/speak Dianna "I am just happy that we can see each other again big sis!$h"/emote Dianna 32/animate Dianna false true 100 20 20 21 21 22 22 21 21 20 20 21 21 22 22 21 21/pause 5000/fade/stopAnimation Dianna/viewport -2000 -2000/message "Everything went well.."/message "We all went home after that..."/message "Lunna and Dianna are really happy"/pause 2000/friendship Dianna 500/friendship Lunna 200/end dialogue Lunna "Thank you for today @! Let us visit Umuwi once more soon$h"

Entries.WizardLunnaLake: Good day @,^^I require your assistance for a certain spell. This is regarding the magic that turned Lunna human. Come by my tower in the earliest of your convenience^^-Harvest Goddess
Entries.WizardLunnaLakeAlt: Good day @,^^I require your assistance for a certain spell. This is regarding the ancient magic I mentioned about Lunna. Come by my tower in the earliest of your convenience^^-Harvest Goddess

Entries.75160011/f Wizard 1000/t 600 2200: WizardSong/6 16/farmer 8 23 0 Wizard 10 15 2/playSound doorClose/showFrame Wizard 16/textAboveHead Wizard "Suppose this is the way.."/pause 2000/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Wizard 16/pause 800/move Wizard -2 0 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Oh hello there @.#$b#I was in the middle of researching some ancient magic"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -6 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "My apologies @. I seem to be deeply lost in my own thoughts.#$b#I have a certain magical problem regarding ancient magic on Lunna"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "What about Lunna you ask?#$b#For now it is none of your concern."/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/emote Wizard 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "May I ask, Do you plan to romantically pursue Lunna?"/pause 200/speak Wizard "$q 751612 null#Do you have romantic intentions towards Lunna?#$r 751611 0 romanceLunna_Yes#Yes I do.#$r 751612 0 romanceLunna_No#No I don't"/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 2000/speak Wizard "Well, I am sorry @, But I would need to kindly ask you to leave for now.#$b#I have some studies to attend to"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.75160009/e 75160008/t 600 2200: WizardSong/6 16/farmer 8 23 0 Wizard 10 15 2/skippable/playSound doorClose/showFrame Wizard 16/textAboveHead Wizard "..and we would have.."/pause 2000/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Wizard 16/pause 1000/move Wizard -2 0 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah! @! I've been expecting you!#$b#Come close, boy^Come close, girl"/move farmer 0 -7 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I have found an amazing discovery!#$b#Regarding the magic Lunna is under, I have discovered that it is reacting a lot more calmer whenever you are with her."/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It seems that you, One who can see and speak to Junimos and who is also closely linked to Lunna's emotions, have a unique effect on the ancient magic that she is under"/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wizard "Hmmmmm What if..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "Maybe I should bring you to that place"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "The place where I found Lunna.#$b#Let us go @. Let us not waste any more time.#$b#This is truly intriguing"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeToTemporaryMap LunnaLake false/warp farmer 13 18/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Wizard 15 18/faceDirection Wizard 0/viewport -2000 -2000/stopMusic/playMusic woodsTheme/viewport 14 12/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/move Wizard 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Here we are.#$b#I did not have you invite Lunna yet. We can't have her hopes too high up now can we."/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Now, @.#$b#I need you to stand right here in front of the lake.#$b#And I shall do an incantation that may produce some effect."/move farmer 1 0 0/move Wizard 1 0 0/move Wizard 0 -2 2/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Brace yourself @. You might feel a little strange"/emote farmer 28/pause 1500/showFrame Wizard 16/textAboveHead Wizard "Alright then...."/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 3/emote farmer 16/emote Wizard 16/pause 800/glow 194 255 4 true/removeTile 15 15 Buildings/removeTile 14 16 Buildings/removeTile 13 15 Buildings/pause 2000/stopGlowing/pause 2000/textAboveHead Wizard "Fascinating.."/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It was a success!$h#$b#It appears that we have opened a rift on the pond's magic barrier.#$b#We have opened a portal to somewhere!"/emote farmer 16/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "I shall go ahead @.#$b#I shall call unto you if it is safe to enter"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 0/warp Wizard -2000 -2000/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/jump farmer/speak Wizard "@! Come and follow! It is a safe passage!"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 1 0/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 -1 0/glow 255 255 255 true/playSound wand/viewport -1000 -1000/stopGlowing/message "Woah!"/changeToTemporaryMap Umuwi false/warp farmer 93 28/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Wizard 92 31/faceDirection Wizard 3/stopMusic/playMusic SettlingIn/viewport -1000 -1000/viewport 92 31/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "This is marvelous!"/move Wizard -1 0 3/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 3 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak Wizard "We have made such an amazing discovery @! This is marvelous!"/faceDirection Wizard 3/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "If I have the time, I could explore this place.#$b#Unfortunately I do not have such luxury."/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "You see I have to maintain the magic barrier that protects Stardew Valley.#$b#Fortunately for you @, You may explore these areas.#$b#Just be cautious for it is a new world."/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I think it is time for us to go back now.#$b#You better tell Lunna the good news then, boy^You better tell Lunna the good news then, girl#$b#I am sure she would be very pleased"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "A whole new world!"/message "This is exciting!"/end
Entries.75160013/e 75160012/t 600 2200: WizardSong/6 16/farmer 8 23 0 Wizard 10 15 2/skippable/playSound doorClose/showFrame Wizard 16/textAboveHead Wizard "..and we would have.."/pause 2000/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Wizard 16/pause 1000/move Wizard -2 0 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah! @! I've been expecting you!#$b#Come close, boy^Come close, girl"/move farmer 0 -7 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I have found an amazing discovery!#$b#Regarding the magic Lunna is under, I have discovered that it has relation to Junimo magic!"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It seems that you, One who can see and speak to Junimos and is a medium for them in this world, should have a unique effect on the ancient magic that she is under"/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wizard "Hmmmmm What if..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "Maybe I should bring you to that place"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "The place where I found Lunna.#$b#Let us go @. Let us not waste any more time.#$b#This is truly intriguing"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeToTemporaryMap LunnaLake false/warp farmer 13 18/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Wizard 15 18/faceDirection Wizard 0/viewport -2000 -2000/stopMusic/playMusic woodsTheme/viewport 14 12/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/move Wizard 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Here we are.#$b#The place where I found Lunna."/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You ask about Lunna huh?.. Well..#$b#Lunna says that she is not human, she came from a place called Umuwi."/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Wizard "According to her, certain events led her into jumping to a certain lake,#$b#And when she woke up, she found herself to have turned into a human and now beside this pond here in front of us."/emote farmer 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "I believe her. For I sense such strong ancient magic from her, thus I kept an eye on her.#$b#Took her in and taught her about this world and to be a human."/pause 2000/speak Wizard "Now, enough chit-chat. @.#$b#I need you to stand right here in front of the lake.#$b#And I shall do an incantation that may produce some effect."/move farmer 1 0 0/move Wizard 1 0 0/move Wizard 0 -2 2/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Brace yourself @. You might feel a little strange"/emote farmer 28/pause 1500/showFrame Wizard 16/textAboveHead Wizard "Alright then...."/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 2000/playSound wand/glow 194 255 4/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 3/emote farmer 16/emote Wizard 16/pause 800/glow 194 255 4 true/removeTile 15 15 Buildings/removeTile 14 16 Buildings/removeTile 13 15 Buildings/pause 2000/stopGlowing/pause 2000/textAboveHead Wizard "Fascinating.."/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It was a success!$h#$b#It appears that we have opened a rift on the pond's magic barrier.#$b#We have opened a portal to somewhere!"/emote farmer 16/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "I shall go ahead @.#$b#I shall call unto you if it is safe to enter"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 0/warp Wizard -2000 -2000/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/jump farmer/speak Wizard "@! Come and follow! It is a safe passage!"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 1 0/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 -1 0/glow 255 255 255 true/playSound wand/viewport -1000 -1000/stopGlowing/message "Woah!"/changeToTemporaryMap Umuwi false/warp farmer 93 28/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Wizard 92 31/faceDirection Wizard 3/stopMusic/playMusic SettlingIn/viewport -1000 -1000/viewport 92 31/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "This is marvelous!"/move Wizard -1 0 3/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 3 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak Wizard "We have made such an amazing discovery @! This is marvelous!"/faceDirection Wizard 3/emote Wizard 40/pause 1000/speak Wizard "If I have the time, I could explore this place.#$b#Unfortunately I do not have such luxury."/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "You see I have to maintain the magic barrier that protects Stardew Valley.#$b#Fortunately for you @, You may explore these areas.#$b#Just be cautious for it is a new world."/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I think it is time for us to go back now.#$b#I better tell Lunna the good news!#$b#I am sure she would be very pleased"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "A whole new world!"/message "This is exciting!"/end

Entries.give_pendant: This.. This pendant @.. M. Rasmodius taught me about this in your culture..$u#$b#Is this not what you give the one whom you want to marry?$u#$b#...$u#$b#!!!$6#$b#@!!! Are you really?$10#$b#Ofcourse it is a yes! I million times over! I love you!$l
Entries.Fri: Hello there @!#$e#I spend most of today with the Goddess.#$b#Why? Well... For learning more about the world actually.$8
Entries.Fri10: Love! @! I am so glad we can talk today!#$e#Hey.. Uhmm can you ask the Goddess if I can be free today? I want to spend it with you.$s

Entries.Sun.000: The Goddess has got me reading these books about the world.$0#$e#I do not mind, for I am enjoying learning more about everything.$8

Entries.75160004/e 75160003/f Lunna 1500/t 900 1: playful/8 21/farmer 6 27 0 Lunna 5 19 0 Pierre 4 17 2/skippable/pause 1000/emote Lunna 32/speak Lunna "The fruits you sell here taste great Pierre!$h"/pause 500/speak Pierre "Well ofcourse! I grow most of my produce here myself!$h"/pause 500/emote Lunna 8/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh? But most of the good ones here I see look like what @ grows?$s"/pause 500/emote Pierre 16/pause 800/speak Pierre "Oh! Yeah! I mean I also get shipping from %farm and uhmm..$4"/pause 800/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 800/emote Pierre 16/pause 500/faceDirection Lunna 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Pierre "Oh welcome @!#$b#Here to buy more seeds eh?$h"/pause 200/speak Lunna "Hello @! Nice seeing you here!$h#$b#I am just buying some tasty fruits to munch on while I stroll around town.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Lunna 0/textAboveHead Lunna "Here is the payment Pierre!"/pause 1000/speak Pierre "Thank you so much Lunna!#$b#Uhhh here! Have an extra piece of fruit! Grown by yours truly!$h"/pause 500/emote Lunna 20/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh wow thank you!"/pause 500/faceDirection Lunna 2/pause 500/speak Lunna "Hey @.$0#$b#Care to stroll around town with me after buying some seeds?$8"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeToTemporaryMap Town false/warp farmer 71 9/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Lunna 72 9/faceDirection Lunna 2/viewport -2000 -2000/viewport 76 13/pause 500/animate Lunna false true 100 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 19 19 19/pause 2000/speak Lunna "This is so tasty!$9"/emote farmer 32/emote Lunna 20/pause 1500/speak Lunna "The strolling around was nice too!$8"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Lunna 2/pause 500/speak Lunna "Hey @! Thank you so much for hanging around with me this day$0."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Lunna "I do not know a lot of people here in Town. I just started staying here a little while before you arrived.$u"/faceDirection Lunna 3/pause 500/speak Lunna "I feel people would find me strange if they get to know me more..$s#$b#Plus, the Goddess discourages me on spending too much time with other people..$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 800/emote Lunna 16/pause 800/speak Lunna "Oh! I mean she is a really wonderful person. Do not get me wrong.$8#$b#We have reasons why she does that and I understand.$u"/pause 1000/speak Lunna "But I do wonder about how other people see me...$s"/pause 500/speak Lunna "$q 751605 null#What do you think @?#$r 751605 30 event_4lunna1#A pretty and sweet girl.#$r 751605 30 event_4lunna2#A fun and caring person.#$r 751605 -50 event_4lunna3#An annoying and too loud a person"/pause 1000/speak Lunna "I really appreciate you being forward to me @.$0#$b#Along with spending time with little old me today...$u"/pause 1000/speak Lunna "It really means a lot. Thank you.$8"/pause 500/speak Lunna "Come on! Let us get more tasty fruits!"/emote farmer 20/pause 1500/fade/pause 1000/message "That was a fun walk with Lunna"/end

Entries.75160003/e 75160002/f Lunna 1000/t 900 2: playful/7 6/farmer 7 10 0 Lunna 12 5 1/skippable/pause 2000/shake Lunna 1000/pause 1000/emote Lunna 40/speak Lunna "Hmmmmm.. How do I do this?$s"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Lunna "What if I.."/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Lunna 2/pause 1000/emote Lunna 16/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move Lunna -5 0 2/move Lunna 0 2 2/pause 1000/speak Lunna "@!! Great timing!$h#$b#I was planning on fixing and tidying this shack today. Entries.75160016/f Bianka 500/t 600 1800/w sunny: SettlingIn/57 37/farmer 73 37 3 Bianka 57 37 2 Dianna -100 -100 0/skippable/pause 2000/emote Bianka 56/pause 800/move farmer -12 0 3/faceDirection Bianka 1/emote Bianka 32/pause 800/move Bianka 2 0 1/speak Bianka "@! It's so nice of you to visit Umuwi again!$h#$b#What brings you here? Just touring around? Like, Aren't you busy with your farm or like something? What's it like living in Pelican Town? Are there any cute people there I haven't seen yet or like just hinding? Is it really fun managing a farm by yourself? I'm SOOO sorry!$u#$b#I was just talking on and on!$u#$b#Really I'm so sorry, I'm just so happy that there's another human that can visit Umuwi now.$0#$b#Well I know my brother's here too and Lunna's technically a human now...and...$0"/move Bianka 1 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Bianka "..and sometimes, I see this lady that comes from portal and seems to be observing Umuwi from the distance.$a#$b#I can sense her magic when she does, and I'm pretty sure she senses my brother and I keeping an eye on her too.$a"/emote farmer 40/pause 800/move Bianka -1 0 1/pause 500/speak Bianka "Well, It's all fine though!$0#$b#I'm preeetty sure she's just studying the overflowing magic from Umuwi and I can't blame him!$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Bianka "Oh? What's up with the magic here? Why.."/playSound doorClose/warp Dianna 60 31/faceDirection Dianna 0/pause 500/faceDirection Dianna 1/pause 500/emote Dianna 16/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Bianka 0/move Dianna 0 4 2/speak Dianna "Heya humans! Entries.75160016_Tour: pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Dianna -100 -100/warp Bianka 50 31/warp farmer 49 31/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Bianka 0/viewport 50 28/pause 200/move Bianka 0 -3 2/move farmer 0 -3 1/faceDirection Bianka 3/speak Bianka "Here is the order stand, where you can buy local products from Umuwi!$h#$b#Oddi usually manages this stand, she's real good with organizing!#$b#You should check this shop out sometime!"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Bianka 16 37/warp farmer 17 37/faceDirection Bianka 0/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport 16 37/pause 200/move Bianka 0 -2 2/pause 1000/speak Bianka "This here is my brother's shop. I was just stretching out, Ehehe.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Bianka 2/pause 1000/speak Bianka "This spot is a good place to chill isn't?$h#$b#Even the magic in this particular spot is calmer."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Bianka "Oh? You're asking again about the magic here?#$b#Well, now that you think about it, Dianna cut us off as I was about to answer your question earlier!"/switchEvent 75160016_Talk
Entries.75160016_Talk: pause 500/textAboveHead Bianka "Where should I start..."/pause 1000/speak Bianka "Well.. I guess I can start to why my brother and I got stuck here."/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Bianka "You know my Raphael and I are sorcerers right? Studying under the guidance of our parents and other magic users.#$b#One day while travelling, my brother and I discovered an ancient lake in the woods near CastleVillage. It was emitting strong magic, it seemed like it was going to explode or something.#$b#Miss Camilla from CastleVillage, who was a senior overseeing us told us not to come close to it.#$b#Being the ever curious brother that I have, Raphael insisted that we inspect it. I agreed coz I was curious as well..#$b#..and well, the exact moment we were beside the lake waters, There was a magical explosion from the lake and we were blinded by a bright light."/emote farmer 16/pause 800/speak Bianka "Upon waking up, My brother and I found ourselves drenched and swimming in the lake.#$b#But this time, we were not near CastleVillage anymore...$a#$b#We have arrived in a strange new place, which soon enough is this place called Umuwi. Inhabited by Shadowfolk.#$b#We were scared at first but then to our surprise, They were really friendly!$h#$b#They helped us out the lake, gave us clothes, food, and shelter and eventually welcomed us here in Umuwi."/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Bianka "That all happened 5 years ago. Magic was not cut from us and we were able to contact our parents and tell them we're fine. But ever since then we were stuck here in Umuwi.#$b#But thats all changed now that you've opened up the portal again!$h#$b#Thank you!!!!$h#$b#Thanks to you, My brother and I can leave anytime now!"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move Bianka 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Bianka "Yeah, It's fun and all but...$s"/emote Bianka 40/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Bianka 3/speak Bianka "Uhmmm nevermind!$s#$b#That was nothing!$0#$b#Don't worry about it!$h"/emote farmer 40/pause 800/showFrame Bianka 16/speak Bianka "Well! I had a fun day with you @! Thank you for spending time with me!"/pause 200/faceDirection Bianka 3/emote Bianka 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Bianka "I really had fun today! Hope you enjoy your visit in Umuwi!$h"
Entries.NoTourBianka: stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Bianka "It wouldn't be fun hanging out with a talkative person like me.$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Bianka 3/speak Bianka "I better go now. I have to do something. Hope atleast you enjoy your visit here in Umuwi.$0"/move Bianka 0 -3 0/pause 3000/end dialogue "Oh hey... I should keep my mouth shut or else you'd not talk to me again or something..$s"
Entries.75160022/e 75160021/f Bianka 2250/t 600: sweet/89 30/farmer -100 -100 0 Bianka 92 30 3 Esmeralda 88 32 3 Raphael 87 33 0 Wizard 86 32 1/skippable/pause 2000/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp farmer 92 28/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection Bianka 0/emote Bianka 32/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 2/speak Bianka "@!! Such timing! I was about to come get you!$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Bianka "What's up? Oh!#$b#Today's going to be my removal of magic ritual!$h#$b#I'm finally going to get what I want @.#$b#I'm really nervous I don't know why... Is it me worrying about the after effects? Will I still look the same? Am I really doing this? @ hold me close.. Is this really it!?.$s"/emote farmer 56/emote Bianka 28/pause 500/speak Bianka "Oops!$u#$b#There I go again rambling on and on.$s#$b#I'm sorry I'm just so nervous @..$s"/faceDirection Esmeralda 1/emote Esmeralda 16/speak Esmeralda "Hey sweetie! We're going to start in a moment! We need you to come here and we'll explain what's going to happen."/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Bianka 3/emote Esmeralda 56/pause 500/speak Esmeralda "Oh why you're already here @! We're glad to have you! Come here dear.$h"/move Bianka 0 1 3/move Bianka -5 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Esmeralda 3/speak Bianka "Hey Mom and Miss Goddess!$h#$b#So what's the plan?"/speak Esmeralda "Well dear, Lulu here will explain the ritual for you okay?"/speak Wizard "Why little Bianka! You've grown up to become such a youthful lass! You might've not remembered me, But I'm a long time friend of your Mom and Dad."/speak Bianka "Oh! You are!$h#$b#I'm sorry for not remembering Miss Goddess.."/speak Wizard "It's fine young one, I may not know the full reason why you want to get rid of your magic, and I may find it a waste of talent, But Esmeralda is a good friend of mine and I'm here to help."/speak Bianka "Thank you Miss Goddess! This is really a big deal for me."/emote Bianka 32/emote Wizard 32/pause 800/speak Wizard "Now.. This ritual won't eliminate your magic, Rather transfer it to somewhere else.#$b#Magic can't be simply destroyed as one pleases, It is easier and much more convenient to store it some place else.#$b#That is why we have decided to have your brother, Raphael, take in your magic."/emote Bianka 16/emote farmer 16/emote Raphael 28/pause 500/speak Bianka "Oh!! What?$u#$b#I'm fine with that and all but.. Won't the magic overflow in Raphael? Won't it be too much for him to control??$s"/speak Raphael "Ahaha you worry too much sis!$h#$b#Don't worry we have talked about this."/speak Esmeralda "Yes dear, There's no need to worry for your brother. His years and years of training has increased his capacity for magic along with control. He is very much capable for such endeavor, not to mention, He wants to use your magic in order to have him grow into a better sorcerer and wizard one day."/speak Wizard "Young Raphael is really quiete impressive, for such capability for magic at your age, You could indeed catch up to your father and mother's level in no time."/speak Raphael "Thank you Miss Goddess. But this would never be possible if Bianka has not willed for it to be. Thank you sis, you little chatterbox."/speak Bianka "Don't make me cry you big oaf! Thank you too, You're a good brother, I'll give you that!$7#$b#Take good care of my magic and use it for good okay!? Don't go corrupted on us now! Haha!$h"/emote Raphael 32/emote Bianka 32/pause 1000/stopMusic/speak Wizard "Well then? Let's get started shall we."/speak Esmeralda "Bianka dear, We would need you to stand right here dear, Then you Raphael, over here..."/move Bianka 1 0 2/move Raphael 0 -2 3/move Raphael -1 0 2/move Esmeralda 0 1 0/move Wizard 0 1 0/speak Wizard "Now.. I need you too to emit your magic as your mother and I chant the spell."/emote Bianka 56/emote Raphael 56/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 16/showFrame Esmeralda 16/showFrame Bianka 49/showFrame Raphael 21/emote farmer 16/pause 4000/playSound wand/glow 255 100 100/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 255 100 100/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 255 100 100/speak Bianka "Uhg..$9"/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 800/positionOffset Bianka 0 -20/positionOffset Raphael 0 -20/pause 4000/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/pause 1000/glow 255 50 180/glow 255 50 180/screenFlash .8/warp Bianka 88 31 2/warp Raphael 86 31 2/showFrame Bianka 24/showFrame Raphael 21/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/faceDirection Esmeralda 0/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Esmeralda "My dears, You may stop meditating now.$h"/speak Wizard "Hmmm I do hope the ritual was a success. Thank you so much!$7#$b#I promise I'll always be safe and will always take care..$7"/faceDirection Raphael 1/emote Raphael 32/speak Raphael "I'm really glad you're free now sis, from your own demons and problems.
